operationBinding.selectClause: t.call_phone as phonea, '11808' as phoneb, ch.charge_date as charge_date, to_char(ch.charge_date,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') as charge_date1, 60 as duration, ch.charge/100 as rate, ch.charge/100 as price
operationBinding.whereClause: t.session_id = ch.session_id and trunc(t.call_start_date) = trunc($criteria.date_param) and trunc(ch.charge_date) = trunc($criteria.date_param) and exists ( select my_to_number(decode(length(i.bill_index_start),7,'32'||i.bill_index_start,i.bill_index_start)), my_to_number(decode(length(i.bill_index_end),7,'32'||i.bill_index_start,i.bill_index_end)) from BILLING_COMPANIES tc inner join BILLING_COMPANIES_ind i on i.billing_company_id = tc.billing_company_id where tc.billing_company_id = $criteria.billing_company_id and my_to_number(t.call_phone) >= my_to_number(decode(length(i.bill_index_start),7,'32'||i.bill_index_start,i.bill_index_start)) and my_to_number(t.call_phone) <= my_to_number(decode(length(i.bill_index_end),7,'32'||i.bill_index_end,i.bill_index_end)) ) and getcontractorpricenew(t.call_phone)=-999999999 #if($criteria.no_email) and t.call_kind <> 11 #end
